name: Shadow Sounds
description:
Shadow Sounds is a 2d topdown horror game situated in the antarctic after a mysterious event. The player is entering a goverment facility and has to figure out what is going on and how to overcome it.

It is strongly recommended that you wear headphones and play with a controller(note their is different version with and without controller)
